snippet: The Security Council’s Taliban sanctions committee on Monday added the Pakistan-based Haqqani network to a United Nations blacklist
lead_paragraph: The Security Council’s Taliban sanctions committee on Monday added the Pakistan-based Haqqani network to a United Nations blacklist

headline.seo: Militant Group in Pakistan Added to Sanctions List
headline.main: Militant Group Based in Pakistan Added to Sanctions List
headline.print_headline: Militant Group Based in Pakistan Added to Sanctions List
